00032 struct TableMutatorIntervalHandler : DispatchHandler {
00033   TableMutatorIntervalHandler(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueue *app_queue,
00034                               TableMutatorShared *mutator)
00035     : active(true), comm(comm), app_queue(app_queue), mutator(mutator) {
00036     self_register();
00037   }
00038 
00039   virtual void handle(EventPtr &);
00040 
00041   void flush();
00042 
00043   void self_register();
00044 
00045   void stop() {
00046     ScopedLock lock(mutex);
00047     active = false;
00048   }
00049 
00050   bool stopped() {
00051     ScopedLock lock(mutex);
00052     return !active;
00053   }
00054 
00055   Mutex               mutex;
00056   bool                active;
00057   Comm               *comm;
00058   ApplicationQueue   *app_queue;
